We made a stop here on our way to Arizona.  It's a great super gas station store. Amazed at all the things you can find here, from souvenirs,  hot foods, beverages,  emergency items and needs and even shower services for truckers. I was very impressed.

Spotless restroom & great employees.
This was a great visit. ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: I didn‚Äôt eat here, but I stopped for one night with my family. We needed a place to park overnight and we found plenty of available spots here for free. We slept in our car and felt safe ‚Äî the area was clean and secure. The restrooms were clean, and the store prices were reasonable. Overall, a convenient and comfortable stop.

Stopped here overnight to shower and rest, the RV motorcoach I was driving had a door malfunction and would not open.  Maintenance person Jesse came out and used a ladder to climb into the passenger window to open the entry door from the ‚Ä¶

Very nice and clean showers, no wait
Staff are nice and friendly
Thank you ‚Ä¶
Clean enough. The showers could be a little cleaner. They let people park wherever they want to-even in fire lanes. This makes it hard for people that LEGALLY park to maneuver and get in/out.

Follow Travelers-
We ALL have to go to the bathroom üöΩ that is apart of life. Ladies, we fart and poop üßÅ cupcakes just like to boys. ‚Ä¶

Quick service ‚Ä¶ no waiting in line for restrooms although we came about 6am .. very clean and they have kiosk to check out so you don‚Äôt have to wait in line or for the truckers to do their thing. They offer hot food for breakfast and it seems like it‚Äôs possible they‚Äôre serving food all hours.

showerReviews.reviewText:
Great place to stop and lot a
Of facilities are offered. Gas at a reasonable price

Always a good place to stop, no matter the time. Bathrooms are always clean. Staff is helpful. Plenty of items to quench your thirst and a good selection of snacks. Plus you can find many items to help you with your phone or vehicle accessories. There is also a Subway inside to help you grab a quick bite.

CLEAN rest stop with a large variety of snacks, drinks and food for everyone in the family. Friendly staff and is easy to get in and out of. The location has a Subway inside as well as showers and rest area with a somewhat odd barbershop location for travelers to get a hair cut.

Great truck stop. Very busy. 32 showers. At 11:30 p.m. when I showered, only 4 of them were available.  The restaurant service was great, and the food was good! There's a Subway, a barber shop, a fitness center (was closed for cleaning), and a Verizon Wireless counter.

No to this coffee station, and the bathroom has an under toe of smell that always persists. If you come here early-late, like 9:30 10:00   parking at the TA means you get no food, so much good food across the hwy and completely ‚Ä¶

Huge lot. We always find a spot.

Edit, had to add as of 09/28/24 was amazing to shower here. Haven‚Äôt had a good ‚Ä¶

This place is huge!  Lots of truck parking and other great conveniences, like washing machines and dryers, a movie room, clean bathrooms and a repair shop.
There is a few spots just for camper and rv parking up front but they fill up fast.

showerReviews.reviewText: Nice truck stop with a dirt lot, free parking, and clean bathrooms. The employee was very kind and the parking lot was less than half full on a Sunday night at 7pm. I'll definitely be back.

Not as sketchy as it appears from the outside. Pleasant staff and clean restrooms. Not stocked with a wide variety of items, but has the basics for  a quick stop. Not a large parking lot but does have CAT scales.

Been stopping here for years off and on always have parking always free Good clean truck stop good coffee nice and strong and you can walk over to "The Works"(formerly "Primos") and get a decent meal although it's a little pricey. Also the ‚Ä¶

We fill up  propane for our company vehicles restrooms and very clean and I am proud of the employees there because they do a real good job and I think they all deserve raises happy customer thank you.

Sure the outside is a little dated and looks a bit run down but this is a really nice place inside, clean restrooms, clean showers, nice lounge for truck drivers and the cashier working was the sweetest and kindest cashier I have ever met in my life. Bless her heart. Definitely recommend stopping here.

This place is pretty small but it has everything you need. Nice little store with lots of drinks and snacks and a very friendly staff.  The showers were clean. We could not find our gas receipt to claim our free shower but the cashier was ‚Ä¶

Getting stuck here over night due to weather was a nightmare... it was dark and dank and looked super trashy and dirty...I was scared to even go into the store fearing what the bathrooms would look like,  when I  finally went in,  I was ‚Ä¶

A small fueling station that sits on the south side of town.   It's a clean place to park a big truck, however space is limited on property,  however there's parking on the street as well.  Fueling area is kept clean.  I was quite impressed with what I experienced.
This truck stop is very clean, has friendly employees, bathrooms and showers, and great fuel! I highly recommend stopping by even for snacks. The owner is also a wonderful and outstanding man!
Clean washroom facilities,  diesel fuel, a tire shop , and a big truck parking space , we used the adicional parking lot to spend the night in the RV , quiet place for a snooze.

showerReviews.reviewText: I expect when I fuel over 150 gallons every 3 days in truck stop I get free coffee and shower and some points like most of truck stop some truck stop small no showers I understand but charge for coffee it‚Äôs ridiculous

They have 6 really clean restroom‚Äôs, a huge parking lot which you can park for free, catscale‚Äôs are  $11 & housescale‚Äôs are $9 reweighs are $2. Shower‚Äôs are $10 unless you fuel more than 50 gallons. With the purchase of diesel you get a ‚Ä¶

This is for all truck drivers, if you stop and get fuel in a Holliday weekend,don't expect to take a shower, they will not give you one because they give preference to to people that stop for gas, just like that .
This is a great truck stop, the price for fule is lower than other places. It also has free parking. You can shower here aslo.
nice place to stop and rest shower or get more snakes or food for the road
Very clean and extra large shower!
It has everything. Truck stop has shower and everything. Very friendly people.
Good service, but no shower.

showerReviews.reviewText: Stopped to fuel and use the restroom and the door was locked. 2 people come to the door and told us it was closed. Yet, a tow truck driver that was fueling up walks out of the store with a coffee in his hand while we walked away.  It's 9:20 ‚Ä¶

For a long time I've been missing a big and clean gas station in Mojave that I can stop at on my way to and from Mammoth. My wish was finally granted when this place opened (re-opened?). They have cheap gas, many gas pumps, clean restrooms, ‚Ä¶
These guys having the cleanest restrooms, friendliest service, snacks galore, & the best Crunchy Fried Chicken!
